properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Vipaji vyetu -
pokea Bwana pokea.
Tulivyo navyo -
ee (Bwana pokea x2).

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pokea pokea pokea
Bwana Pokea. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Matunda yetu -
pokea Bwana pokea.
Mazao yetu -
ee (Bwana pokea x2).

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mioyo yetu -
pokea Bwana pokea.
Maisha yetu -
ee (Bwana pokea x2).

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Matendo yetu -
pokea Bwana pokea.
Magumu yetu -
ee (Bwana pokea x2).
